items.title: macOS (Primary)
items.subtitle: A proprietary graphical operating system developed and marketed by Apple Inc, since 2001

items.title: iOS
items.subtitle: A mobile operating system created and developed by Apple Inc

items.title: Microsoft Windows
items.subtitle: A group of several proprietary graphical operating system families, all of which developed and marketed by Microsoft

items.title: Linux
items.subtitle: A family of open-source Unix-like operating systems based on the Linux kernel

items.title: Ubuntu
items.subtitle: A Linux distribution based on Debian and composed mostly of free and open-source software

items.title: ElementaryOS
items.subtitle: A Linux distribution based on Ubuntu LTS
